column4: Hey guys, (I have to admit a part of me is a bit embarrassed) I just wanted to know how well Ubuntu 9.04 ran on the new Macbook Pro? Are there any driver issues? Does everything (hardware wise) work well? What about the trackpad and gestures? Thanks
and petrus I havent bout a macbook pro yet... have never had a mac... ever...
if your buying a mac book pro for ubuntu, I wouldn't suggest it =p macs are expensive.
